title: North Kimberley expedition
brief_description: An area of some 30,000 square miles in the North Kimberleys, Western Australia has not been settled. The film covers a survey expedition ot the great expanse of uninhabited country between Karunjie-Gibb River and Kalumburn Mission. Expedition leader: John F. Morgan.
